Title: Tesla UK Attempting to Return Car After Diagnosed Steering Failure

Title: My Powerwall failed three months ago and Nothing from Tesla

Title: Hard rattle and squeak

Title: Paid the 250 order fee for a Tesla Fake finance

Title: Tesla is an unregulated entity in UK
Content: Tesla is an unregulated entity in UK They are not registered with the Motor Ombudsman and do not have any code of conduct for customer service They do not have any mechanism to register any complaints They are using the loophole in motoring industry as perhaps the only business not having signed up to regulator So you cannot take your grievance to any regulator The only way to escalate would be to take legal action which in most cases is disproportionately expensive and time consuming If any of you can su

Title: Innovative company
Content: Without a doubt it's an innovative company which has changed the world of automotive Props to the genius Musk who has managed to build such a big corporation with billions dollars turnover and yeah nowadays many people around the globe stick to the green agenda and the concept of electro cars perfectly fits society's sentiment I personally have no Tesla car but I have watched tons of reviews and videos in the youtube and I believe Model S is the future of automotive

Content: I brought my Model Y to Tesla Collision in Paramus NJ The receptionist Valentina was so helpful She helped me sign in the car for repair She advised me about how to get a ride home from Uber I had never used a ride system before I tried to use Lyft but had difficulty When she saw me struggling with my phone she came over and downloaded Uber for me and arranged for a ride She made sure that everything worked okay Valentina is a great representative for Tesla

Title: Tesla Legal Scam
Content: Warning Tesla Legal Scam Read this before you take Tesla to court Tesla has two companies One is called Tesla Motors and the other is called Tesla Financial Services If you purchase a car it will come from Tesla Motors When you have a problem with the vehicle you will speak to the sales and customer support departments If the dispute becomes legal you will likely get transferred to the legal department as I did This is where the big scam begins The legal department is a different company called Tesla Fina

Content: Customer service once again has been very poor from Tesla I ve got multiple issues with my 2020 model 3 mostly build quality related There is also an issue with keyless entry via smartphone which I m told is a common problem and can t be fixed The experience with the service centre is poor from start to finish It s all done through the app so you can t actually speak to a real person They ve not actually managed to fix the issues with my vehicle as they haven t got the parts in stock despite being told th

Title: Appalling experience with Tesla
Content: I took a lease on a Tesla Y a few months ago It's a company car through my own business and was a no brainer on cost with tax savings etc The purchase was amazing Super smooth rapid availability very helpful We had planned to get two more as company cars when the other directors' current leases expire The car itself is really lovely to drive fast smooth A delight That's the 2 in the 2 10 But the after care experience is beyond appalling and would definitely stop me choosing Tesla again The car is delivere

Title: Got outer track rod end replaced
Content: Got outer track rod end replaced estimate was for 1 5 hours actually took less than 1 hour yet still charged the 1 5 hours 165 00 per hour Was told that it was done quicker as the technician was experienced Of course a complaint is on its way to Tesla HQ

Title: Never Tesla Again
Content: For solar panels during the initial consultation it was known that HOA insurance covers my roof But I was told to pay 250 regardless They said they will send design within a week Nothing for a month after couple of followups They cancelled my order without notifying me of any reason in an email And upon reaching customer service reason provided was that HOA owns the roof And I will get my refund within a month You knew that from the get go I just landed 250 to a large organization for 2 months interest free

Title: Customer service is terrible After
Content: Customer service is terrible After placing an order and awaiting the information to confirm the delivery date no one has contacted me regarding this information The next thing I know my order has been canceled According to the representative I need to reorder and pay 250 I do not believe Tesla's customer service is the smartest propel They are not trained to solve problems but rather to avoid them I find it very sad

Title: Very very very bad customer service
Content: Very bad customer service

Title: Shocking customer service and delivery
Content: Shocking customer service and delivery service Cancelled delivery 3 times for my vehicle Paid 131k and the service is shocking Offered me 100 for cancelled delivery and then want me to jump hoops to give them proof of travel Then offered me 100 free super change miles when I have already got 3 years free superchange on my vehicle After waiting 2 5 years for this car I hope I can get better service aftersales but I doubt this and now regreting the purchase now

Title: Don t by a Tesla is absolutely garbage
Content: Don t by a Tesla is absolutely garbage I bought 2018 22000 miles on it from tesla used cars section I took it many times to their service location because of problems in the screen they fixed it right still have same problems now they asking for 4000 dollars to fix it I drove my Honda accord for over 230kmiles and still rolling like a clock

Title: Where to start

Title: The worst company ever
Content: The worst company ever I have forty years as a car owner and i had several brands never imagined that a company could have a service like this it is simply horrible My experience at TESLA LISBON at CORTE INGLES has been a perfect disaster Sales people have absolutely no attention to the client never repply to phone calls or emails a disaster Never Ever Try to buy a TESLA car MR ELON MUSK OPEN YOUR EYES

Title: I've now sold my Tesla but the last 4
Content: I've now sold my Tesla but the last 4 years have been great I have had to use their service centres 6 times and only Park Royal stood out as crappy Everyone else was incredibly helpful and solved my issues without any drama or costs The service rangers that come to you are a game changer

Title: My favorite car ever
Content: From choosing my car going through the extremely easy purchase process to owning it I am blown away with each step I have an incredible car that is one of the safest on the road The technology is amazing and I love driving anywhere I can It s sad that the complainers are usually the only ones who write reviews Let s go Tesla owners tell everyone how awesome your car is

Title: Tesla service model is way better than traditional dealers
Content: Tesla s service model is very different I am sure some people have bad experiences at their local service centres but the one near me is great From delivery day to the few times I ve been in every interaction was very customer focused I like using the app to communicate And the best of all is the mobile service My local mobile service tech has been to my house a few times and he s quick courteous and does great work I won t buy another car brand This way of doing business is so much better than any dealer

Title: Great car horrible service and culture
Content: Yes Tesla cars are fantastic but the second you have to deal with Tesla service you will be lied to constantly You will then be forced to bribe Tesla to fix things even when it s under warranty Tesla is one of the most untrustworthy companies you can buy from

Title: Always had a great experience with Tesla
Great car
Content: Great car had for 15 months now no problems whatsoever very cheap to run no or very minimal servicing and covers all journeys with pleasure Range anxiety really is not a problem with these and their excellent supercharger network

Title: Tesla model S
Content: I have had the Tesla Model S for 5 years No issues and I only need to buy it tyres 99 000 miles battery still at over 94 and their Superchargers are excellent Tyres lasting 20 25k and average w mile 248 It s a great touring car accommodates 5 adults and luggage or 2M long benches

Title: Awesome products
Content: Awesome products After Tesla cancelled RHD Model S Plaid bookings I looked everywhere for another vehicle to take it's place No luck Eventually I accepted the compromise and purchased a LHD car in the UK the car is awesome so glad I did

Title: Model 3 P since Sept 2019 good response to issues
Content: We've had our Model 3 P since Sept 2019 from new and our interaction and response from Tesla has always been great Either with Milton Keynes or Northampton Service Centres or the mobile rangers Can't fault them when responding and fixing the few issues that we have had with the car either warranty work or minor faults with the car

Title: By far the best car I ve owned
Content: By far the best car I ve owned Tesla are the best when it comes to efficiency and technology I ve had 2 very minor issues in 3 years and booking it in via the app is so easy Both times they came to me with a mobile service technician who was brilliant When reading reviews on here you ll mostly find that people only post negative reviews as everyone else is very pleased with their cars

Title: Let down by poor customer service
Content: Tesla helpline staff by individuals who do not understand the technical issues and do no more than pay platitudes No issues ever followed up phone calls not returned promises not delivered A complete nightmare which makes operating the car a real challenge Would never buy a Tesla again

Title: Excellent service great cars
Content: I've owned a 2014 Model S85 for seven years it's a great car I just bought a replacement a 2017 Model S75 and in a continuation of the excellent service I've had in the past last week I had a Ranger come out to fix a door handle under warranty at my home Excellent service great cars

Title: hard to contact and no customer service
Content: Sadly our experience with TESLA has been very poor and I would be reluctant to recommend them Called out to assist with a German Tesla involved in an RTA collision damage to the front end and steering Tesla repair centre Edinburgh refused to accept the car saying they only do 'bumps and scrapes' Eastern Western approved accident repair centre also refused to take the car Tried to phone TESLA for help got through to their collision centre in Dartford they could offer no advice on how to proceed

Title: Wish I could give Tesla ZERO stars for
Content: Wish I could give Tesla ZERO stars for customer service and support It s as good as non existent Allegedly their EV technology is good but what s the point when the customer service and support are appalling If after a long wait on the phone you re fortunate enough to speak to a human being they don t have the requisite knowledge to assist you I m learning about the car and issues by watching YouTube videos and talking to other Tesla owners

Title: Absent customer service
Content: Absent customer service Ordered Tesla a year ago canceled the order and asked for refund Initially Tesla refused 100 deposit refund despite their own policy that it should be issued back Than an employee Shane Lovely cancelled the order and said that refund of 100 will be made A year later no refund Tesla stopped responding to any of my emails Order RN116800337 model Y

Title: Best Cars you can buy

Title: Every interaction I have had with Tesla has been amazing
Content: Every interaction I have had with Tesla since getting my car has been positive 3 5 years in and Cardiff especially have been amazing People come here to whinge Tesla don t solicit opinion here and that s why the minority push the ratings low Bear that in mind there really isn t a better choice of EV in the UK right now Charging infrastructure is everything

Content: We have 3 and have been through ups and downs and would have left 5 stars if not for one issue on what planet us it normal to charge 12 15 000 for FSD and tell owners it s beta and you re only testing it And then to remove it from the vehicle because the vehicle accused me of not tugging on the wheel on i684 a pure 4 lane straightaway The lawsuits against them have caused Telsa to destroy the self driving experience We just love our Tesla service station on Tarrytown Road and service is huge with us

Title: I have a 2023 Model Y

Title: Degraded customer service
Content: When I bought my first Model 3 The customer support was excellent In the name of non contact digital only service no adequate telephone support lack of access to Tesla centres practices that are really unfriendly The staff are unhelpful they probably think that they are untouchable This may be the beginning of their downfall Cars alone won't keep the company up writing is on the wall Hope they realise as a company It is a collective failure such company policies and work ethics of the employees

Title: My car is brand new 1 month
Content: My car is brand new 1 month Tire got ripped off and Tesla is saying they don t have warranty on tires I don t understand why can they fix its new car they should be responsible for it It s ridiculous I repent why I bought Tesla I advise all don t buy buy it it s hassle for everything They don t have their service center for everything they excuse It is life threatening while driving on highway all of sudden your tire ripped

Title: From ordering a car to taking delivery It was so bad

Content: Went to the Tesla Showroom in Chelmsford today met Tesla Advisor Connor May His service was fantastic absolutely second to none I have been looking for new car so have been to many car showrooms over the last few weeks my experience with Connor knocked the other sales advisors for 6 Honest friendly and patient I felt Connor had one mission and that was to help guide and support me when looking at the Tesla Model Y His enthusiasm for the brand was real and made me truly excited to get on board What an intr

Title: Not good customer service

Title: Horrible
Content: Horrible fff horrible Tesla delivery the model X to my doorstep during the pandemic If something is wrong with your car Tesla will never accept fault And their service department suck ass I m so anger with thier customer service Still under warrantee but they don t give a ffff Love the car but everything else sucks Moving on to another electric car company

Title: Terrible customer care service don't fall for their product It's a horror show
Content: If I can give a negative 5 stars I would TESLA sucks They took over the solar panel company a few years ago The customer service is horrible and so ignorant There has been a pigeon problem derived from the solar panels as the pigeons like to harbor beneath them They simply told me that I am outside the warranty period and they don't care And they refuse to have me talk to their supervisor Don't buy their product You will regret Watch for their stock market crash

Title: Awful customer service
Content: Awful customer service meant to take delivery today took a day off work to be in and told at 4 30pm the car will not be delivered Cannot get through to anyone at Tesla to find out any info speak to anyone Awful

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: I placed an order on 03 May received text message confirming REG and VIN number and delivery date 4 days later received text message saying order has been placed on hold 20 emails later received a text saying it was a mistake and order has now been reinstated Order has now vanished from my account I have spent every day since ordering this car texting emailing and phoning Tesla and still have no answer from them on where my order is I am meant to pick it up in 2 days customer service is pretty much non ex

Title: Dreadful customer service
Content: Dreadful customer service There was a fault when out Powerwall was installed I suspect the PCB on the gateway is faulty Needles and repetitive ideas and suggestions with a 1 week plus gap in any response It looks like an attempt to avoid any responsibility

Title: 2023 Model 3 completely dead after 3
Content: 2023 Model 3 completely dead after 3 months Can t even get into the vehicle to get my stuff out of it It has been a day and an half and they haven t been even able to arrange a tow for the car Have been given the complete runaround And they won t provide a loaner or a rental once they do get the car in to be fixed Never in a million years would I have bought this car if I knew their customer after sales service was like this Anyone want to buy a 2023 Model 3 lol

Title: I love my car but Tesla customer
Content: I love my car but Tesla customer service is simply awful They treat you as if they are doing you a favor selling you the car If you can grit and bear it the car is awesome when you finally receive it

Title: I made an appointment two weeks in
Content: I made an appointment two weeks in advance for simple service 1 Replace windshield wipers and check fluid2 Replace air filterI was at the Tesla service center in Agoura Hills Ca on time in the morning waiting in a que that stretched down the driveway I was told by the service agent that the car would be ready between 4 00 and 5 00 pm I checked updates on line and it appeared that it remained 'in service all day' I finally went on line at the end of the day and was informed that the car would not be ready

Title: Telsa Owners Club of JH recommends you

Title: Worst customer service

Title: The worst service for a car company
Content: The worst service for a car company that makes good cars 1 No one to talk to and I mean no one 2 Impossible to find service appointment bottom when to log in on a desk top 3 They definitely do not listen to any conversation otherwise they would know how rude and unhelpful their associates are specifically Daylen at the Santa Monica center 4 Don't bother leaving them your name and phone to call they will NEVER call you Thank God for other manufacturers entering the electric vehicle market

Title: Tesla Lies
Content: Tesla vehicles are just poor quality nothing works and the who sustainable thing is complete rubbish I have a small crack in the speaker cover on the drivers door 30 piece of plastic tops No not Tesla that want to replace the whole interior door panel for 500 money aside they want to replace a plastic door that has nothing wrong with it the cover clips out by the way So much for sustaining the planet Utter cr p both the car and the mission statement

Title: My front passenger wheel deflated

Content: Ordered model 3 said I can pick it up Mon Wed told them I am working can I arrange for an alternate date they said no you should take a day off IM NOT TAKING A DAY OFF TO PICK UP A CAR they said pick it up or we'll cancel the deal f u you Tesla That's what you call customer service

Title: Awful customer service experience
Content: Awful customer service experience no one to speak to once the car is ordered from start to collection Even when you collect the vehicle the representatives are just there to hand you the keys God forbid you actually have a question about how to use the car Also after sales support what after sales support Impossible to get through on the telephone generic replies by robots to emails The car is good but i would avoid placing orders as if there is a problem there is no one to help you Really expected much b

Title: Diabolical support
Content: On site rangers are great but back office email and phone support is diabolical There are multiple safety and security issues with their vehicles that are not acknowledged whatsoever once they are informed The cars are great until you need support

Title: Bad Build Sloppy Delivery Dealer Did not Check Car
Content: Very poor delivery experience Car was scratched Door did not close properly Did not tell us that we needed to do a safety inspection within 90 days The real clincher was that we came home opened the front hood and it will not close So now we may not be able to drive it to get it fixed and may need to have it towed How difficult would it be for them to make sure that doors and hoods are opening and closing I now wonder what else is not working What a way to start an ownership experience

Title: Dreadfully poor pre sales experience
Content: Dreadfully poor pre sales experience They ignored at least half the text messages I sent them asking questions and never sent me the vehicle licence plate number despite me repeatedly asking for it result being I could't sort out insurance for the car or pay motor tax had to chase them every few days for around a month

Title: As an MD of a technology company and an

Content: I had a delivery date scheduled to collect my MYLR on 14 09 2022 with my full VIN number Unfortunately I received a phone call the day before saying my car had been delivered with damage and I cannot collect They are looking to fix this with approximately within a few weeks however I have not been given any support No hire car or compensation for travel expenses in the interim Communication lacking too

Title: Almost nothing do
The worst customer service ever

Content: Horrible customer service No more face to face with any service advisors and none of the issues get fixed and you keep going back My car has been with Tesla for more than 2 months in the last 2 years StillIssues not fixed and horrible customer service

Content: Although I love my new car and actually had a very good experience with the repair service to take care of a couple of minor problems the customer service in general has been atrocious I actually had one woman tell me when I complained the they pushed my delivery date out by a month and a half for the 3rd time that if I had ordered the more expensive package I would have gotten it sooner I finally received my car with temporary plates These are good for 21 days 2 days before they were due to expire they r

Title: Good

Title: Online order discrepancy Customer service will not answer emails
Content: I've ordered a Model S online here in Germany The web page informs me I can lease it at 1200 per month for 48 months Yet when they send me to the leasing page it states 1800 a month for 48 months I've emailed support twice asking why the discrepancy but still no answer I've also given them my info on the car I want to trade in and it has been a week and no info on the trade in available I will be cancelling and losing my 250 deposit

Content: To say Tesla is bad at customer service is an understatement if I could have given them 0 stars I would Most of the models in their range are considered by most to be prestige cars or at least this is reflected in the price tag I bought a Model S about three and a half years ago for nearly 95k which compares to previous cars I ve bought from Mercedes and Audi Since then I have been impressed by the capabilities and technology of the car whilst at the same time irritated by the build quality and customer s

Title: tesla fails miserably at customer service

Title: Tesla service in Tampa Florida is
Content: Tesla service in Tampa Florida is terrible I've had my 2015 model s there 3 times now Service is slow Usually have to leave car overnight for something simple Never get a complimentary car Spending lots of time and money on rental cars and driving 40 miles to location Thinking about selling it soon Not what I expected

Title: Tesla Leeds hold your heads in shame
Content: Tesla Leeds hold your heads in shame Your customer service front of house skills are non existent Right hand doesn't know what the left one is doing

Title: 22 000 miles so far and I'm perfectly
Content: 22 000 miles so far and I'm perfectly happy with my Model 3LR On the three occasions I have had to go to the service centre in Winchester they have been super efficient and fixed the problems 1st was a misaligned door 2nd some paint correction and finally a chipped and replaced windscreen I am only writing this review as there have been so many negative ones

Title: So nasty staff and soooo bad customer
Content: So nasty staff and soooo bad customer service I ever I see in my entire life

Content: Picked up a brand new Model Y I'm a huge Tesla fan and was so excited to get my car after a 5 month waiting period The front door will not even close without slamming it so hard you think you will break it The quality of the service I received when I picked it up was so disappointing I cant believe this left the factory like this and the dealer inspected it and didnt call to reschedule the delivery Ive asked to have a manager call me multiple times but good luck talking to a person You think you are getti

Content: The worst customer response by the adjuster if you get a Tesla dont have an accident It will take forever to get you vehicle repaired or even looked at It is now going to take 2 months just to get the vehicle into a repair shop that is tesla certified

Title: Not a clue
Content: Following a test drive and having got a little too over excited it is a brilliant car at the Birmingham branch I placed a business lease order for a Model Y with the sales man What a nightmare No one can confirm what where or why my or car is in the process Tesla constantly blame and refer to ALD their chosen finance company ALD constantly blame and refer to Tesla No party has a clue what the other party should be doing A month on and I have nothing to confirm against so have told them to forget whatever

Title: Model S is a poor quality low grade car
Content: Model S is a poor quality low grade car that is so overrated it s untrue Customer service is as poor as the car itself I have had so many problems over the four years of ownership that it s not worth listing then here Just avoid

Title: Really great service from Tesla in
Content: Really great service from Tesla in Heathrow Picked up the case at very short notice due to the incident at Park Royal Quickly located the source of a rattle and fixed it Polite efficient and kept me informed throughout

Title: Been on hold waiting to ask a simple
Content: Been on hold waiting to ask a simple question about my Tesla Y Been on hold now for 40 minutes Hung up in frustration Tesla must do better

Title: Tesla after sales is worse than appalling
Content: I have a 2019 tesla X 100D purchase price c 117000 00I don't usually revert to complaining like this but anybody reading please be aware The Tesla after sales is worse than appalling and I can't begin to express my frustration enoughI have been lucky enough to have owned some amazing high end vehicles including Aston Martin DB9 Maserati Gran Cabriolet Ferrari 575M Marinello Still got it and Audi RS6Im not bragging as I know how lucky I have been to experience some awesome cars and have had dealings with a

Title: Customers are not kept informed of progress
Content: Car in to have some suspension parts replaced Booked in for a 10 12 appointment i e a 2hr slot Just before 11am I received a message on their app saying there was a delay caused by no ramps being available I responded asking for an estimate as to when car would be ready No response was received The app advises you to monitor it for car progress and estimated completion times All it says is car in for repair and no completion times I resorted to calling the support line and was told they would contact the

Title: Wheels ordered on the website
Content: Wheels ordered on the website Charged from credit card the day after Nobody knew where my wheels were After months of daily calls and emails to Tesla and Tesla service centers i could pick them up 175 km away from home When I picked them up the rims were all scratched dented and som of them must have rubbed against some steel as there were rust in the scratches on the rims Very bad customer service with very rude employees

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: Terrible customer service Placed an order for model Y high performance with autopilot 74k car to purchase by my business A glitch in their online ordering system meant the order didn't process correctly but they still took the deposit payment even though no car was ordered and nothing showed on my tesla login I called their helpline as their livechat is rarely on the staff who man the phones don't appear to be trained or understand their systems Emails are a waste of time and take days for a undetailed re

Title: Just had some work done at the chester
Content: Just had some work done at the chester service centre staff all happy to help and work carried out professionally Tesla have been a breath of fresh air never again will I buy a internal combustion vehicle our Tesla model3 has been amazing

Title: Super service
Having employees that love their job shows
Content: Excellent greeting communication through the process and took multiple steps to make sure I was happy with the result A

Title: I had a noise coming from the front
Content: I had a noise coming from the front right wheel I lodged a service call Tesla Mobile came to my house and promptly fixed the issue Fast courteous service Very happy with Tesla Service

Title: I have a 2020 Model Y Performance
Content: I have a 2020 Model Y Performance Service is almost never needed and when I have used service it has been outstanding The car is so quiet it is amazing and the performance is out of this world I have never been in a nicer car Just shocking

Title: Best car
Content: Best car I've ever had No issues in over two years

Title: Tesla Service Experience
Content: This review covers my experience with Tesla service I owned a Model 3 for two years and currently own a Model Y which I've had for a little over two years During the past four years covering both cars I've needed to take the Model 3 in to a service center once and that was to get it's FSD computer upgraded That appointment went without incident Also over the past 4 years I've used Tesla mobile service 4 times to perform tire rotations replace cabin air filters and twice to sanitize the AC condenser coils

Title: So happy with my Model 3
Content: So happy with my 2019 Model 3 that I replaced my second car with a model Y

Title: First ever Tesla Service Center visit
Content: First ever Tesla Service Center visit Scheduling through the app worked great Rolled in and was greeted by the service advisor straight away Out in 3 minutes Vehicle was ready at end of day as promised No pressuring or hard sell to get additional work done hello BMW dealership

Title: The car itself is good the service isn't
Content: The car itself a model 3 long range is decent No denying that The service side is probably the worst I've ever experienced For a 60k car you'd expect decent service The departments are shoddy rude and vilify their customers I wouldn't buy another tesla when I finish with my current one due to the awful experience I've had

Title: I have owned a Model S for seven years
Content: I have owned a Model S for seven years and my service and ownership experience has been amazingly good My latest experience was having the local service centre spend five hours investigating a very small noise before I headed off on a cross continent trip which went perfectly without any noises and I charged exclusively at Superchargers all the way to Montreal and back without any difficulty or delays They adjusted and tightened everything they could possibly find and charged me for only one hour of labou

Title: I have owned a Tesla for 5 years
Content: I have owned a Tesla for 5 years I have not needed much service but the few times I needed it is as exemplary Super easy to schedule in the app good communication via the app a painless experience

Title: Charging at home is great and car
Content: Charging at home is great and car performs amazing

Title: I have a model 3 and over the 4 years
Content: I have a model 3 and over the 4 years of ownership have a relatively maintenance free experience I have used the service centers and have had Tesla mobile come to my home doing the repair in my driveway It was difficult at first to get over the transition from ICE vehicles to EV and the simplicity of intuitive Tesla tech but now that I made the switch I would never go back

Title: Had my first encounter with Tesla service
Content: Had my first encounter with Tesla service center in Hasselt Belgium Problems with my chargeport unfortunately Appointment at 14 00 was cancelled by Tesla last minute due to employees absent Could reschedule to 10 00 same day with replacement car included free of charge Due to last minute unfortunately the loaner wasn t very clean on the in and outside but only needed it to commute 20km Car fixed within 2 hrs free of charge covered by warranty Good communication by service advisor and good solution they pr

Title: 2020 Model 3
Content: I have a 2020 Model 3 I have a few small issues that was covered under warranty The car runs great and everyone should try it

Title: Had a service request and the next day
Content: Had a service request and the next day a mobile unit came to replace my truck actuator for free at my house

Title: I went in without an appointment to say
Content: I went in without an appointment to say hello to some old colleagues While I was there I remarked to a service advisor that my car didn't seem to be finishing its latest software update Simon immediately asked for my vin number and said he would look into it Within 10 minutes he had diagnosed it as being an issue with my home WiFi signal being intermittent He then told me that he had pushed the update to my car via 4G so it could download while I drive home When I got home I noticed it still hadn't finish

Title: Awesome mobile service during South Dakotan Blizzard
Content: I had an amazing experience with Tesla service The driver s seat was gaping from the frame The mobile service Technician came to my work where my Model 3 was parked There was a blizzard at that time in Brookings SD He came fixed it checked with me to make sure everything was fine and then left The Mobile service technicians are awesome Tesla should expand them more

Title: I live 50 miles from a service center
Content: I live 50 miles from a service center TSLA service came all the way to my house to rotate my tires Couldn't be happier Very professional

Title: Best car ever
Content: I've had my Model 3 for almost 4 years now almost no issues 12v battery change and minor noise in the front left side both fixed quickly and for free one by the mobile team I didn't even had to leave my house and the other one just 2 hours in the tesla service center

Title: Mobile service is great
Content: Had a one off issue where the charge port door got stuck closed and would only open if pulled on Created a service appointment and a mobile tech was dispatched in a couple days as the door began opening normally again When the tech arrived he quickly replaced the port door assembly and even cleaned under the headlight The service was quick the tech very helpful and would definitely request mobile service again

Title: A several great service experiences
Content: My experiences with Tesla Service have been wonderful While problems and issues arrive with all new cars and should be expected Tesla has always been quick and easy to work with when in need

Title: Stress free experience
Content: Had several issues in warranty and after they were all fixed at home or at the office or at the service centre in Mississauga The people are polite and friendly chat from the app works So much stress free compared with my XC60 Volvo dealer where I need to be always on alert for unnecessary repairs 450 quoted for a 12V battery replacement which one year and one winter later still works perfectly It was a SW thing Again at Volvo not Tesla

Title: The rare times I ve needed service for
Content: The rare times I ve needed service for our Model S P85 our Model X P100D or our Model X Plaid Tesla accommodated and excelled in every way solving the problem with ease For starters the technicians more often come to your address to resolve the problem If this is not possible then they bring you in to the service center The Tesla application is a fantastic tool for the service department communication with the technicians was simplified by the application I ve never had such good service with other car co

Title: The best product I've purchased in my
Content: The best product I've purchased in my life All my friends family switched to Tesla after me I cannot recommend enough

Title: I have a Tesla Model S P100D and
Content: I have a Tesla Model S P100D and previously had a Model 3P As far as I am concerned the only way is electric and these are the best cars in the sector I have never had anything but minor problems and these have also been dealt with effectively by Tesla service in the UK

Title: Appalling Customer Service

Title: So I m 100 miles away from my house I

Title: The worst

Title: Delivery Support is useless
Content: Delivery dates has been constantly pushed back They require you to get your financial affairs in order months in advanced Delivery support is literally useless and just repeat what you can already read on the app

Title: Customer service is terrible
Content: Customer service is terrible The car drives fine but based on the customer service I would not buy another Tesla The service department also severely struggles to fix issues I ve had multiple issues arise and have had to take the car in 7 times without them being able to fix the problem You also have to use the app to schedule service which just delays the process by weeks because they take days to answers

Title: Avoid Tesla

Title: I have a Tesla Model 3 company car that

Title: Tesla X rear suspension is potentially a killer in my experience
Content: Non existent customer service Great car till you have a problemI have a 8 month old Model X from new 30 000 miles There is a design flaw with the rear suspension which causes the inside edge of the tyres to wear away rapidly I had a blow out and was stranded for 4 hours Tesla know about the fault but don t warn you There is nothing in the owners manual warning you about the defect when you set the ride height to low They will change there policy when someone gets killed with a premature blow out on a bend

Title: Never Buy any car accessory from
Content: Never Buy any car accessory from Tesla's online shop They charged me 230 53 for two Sun shades and never sent me anything My address was perfectly fine and my credit card was charged Several email follow ups with them never got answered after several attempts over one month with no help from anyone in Tesla including the corporate office i realize my money and sunshades are gone in a black hole called Tesla Hence this review

Title: Own a Tesla model 3

Title: Unable to get through to customer

Title: I ve owned a Tesla Model X for the past
Content: I ve owned a Tesla Model X for the past 3 years It s been the absolute worst experience The customer service you receive after purchasing a 100k car is an absolute Joke They have 0 customer service skills and cannot handle the amount of problems they receive The manager at the Tesla service center in Costa Mesa Farzin Morena is a big problem The fact that Tesla has kept him on staff for many years blows my mind I cannot wait to get rid of my Tesla and never will I own one again I do NOT recommend Wait for

Title: Have owned a performance model 3 for 9
Content: Have owned a performance model 3 for 9 months now Overall the car is great likely the best car I've ever driven but their support is awful First experience with support was getting my license plates for the car after purchasing it they arrived in the mail a day after the temporary plates expired I spent weeks calling and trying to get a hold of someone to figure out when they were coming in It was an annoyance but something I could look over The latest issue was fairly recently when I went on a long trip

Title: High end cars Lowest end Customer Service

Title: Customer Service Not fit for purpose
Content: Love the car and concept Model 3 won't charge to the 348 miles advertised Tesla keep telling me the 309 miles it charges to is good They were to get someone to call me and see whether they can extend my miles No call Similar to the mobile service I booked between 0800 1200hrs They also did not turn upWhen I called to see what was happening I was told I would get a call back You guessed it No call After service and customer service not fit for purpose

Title: Not Evan environmental friendly
Content: don't Evan try and buy it not Evan friendly for the planet The math gets trickier though when you include other forms of environmental damage Electric cars need to be light which means they include a lot of high performing metals The lithium in the batteries for example is super light and conductive that s how you get a lot of energy without adding a lot of weight Other rare metals are sprinkled throughout the car mostly in the magnets that are in everything from the headlights to the on board electronics

Title: Had a couple of minor issues
Content: Had a couple of minor issues some user error cleared up quickly on phone 1 alarm issue required trip to Bristol service center Had an appointment in 2 days via app and problem was sorted incredibly quick and efficiently and I was kept informed Only negative is the loan car was quite tatty and Tesla don't wash and clean car Which is something I need to get used to

Title: Service is appalling
Content: Service is appalling main screen will not boot up Tried all reset options using buttons still wouldn't come on Took over an hour and a half to get through to someone just kept on hold Told I had to book the car in under a normal service appointment as the car was still driveable Appointment is just under two weeks away I have no control of heating autopilot no sound including radio no camera no parking sensors no pin number entry for security etc Complained got nowhere Product is great back up is non exis

Title: The worst customer service I have ever known
Content: The sales people tell you what you want to hear and this means lying and conning customers No car is worth the stress that comes from horrendous customer service Choose a company that is nicer to its customers

Title: Don't buy a Tesla
Content: Don't buy a Tesla Yes they are quick and have gadgets but they are full of issues My model 3 arrived with issues and continues to have issues Customer service is non existent I would not recomment

Title: I used to love my model s

Title: Buy at your own risk

Title: The worst car and customer experience ever
Content: The worst car and buying experience I have ever had Tesla are a dreadful company who have no value for customer service I purchased a new Tesla Model 3 long range and the car has a number of issues The car automatically breaks when on cruise control for no reason has performed a dangerous emergency stop manoeuvre for no reason in the middle of a busy high street while I had my children in the car and the regenerative braking failed while I came off the motorway onto a slip road The car doesn't even charge

Title: Nice car but

Title: Have now twice tried to book a test
Content: Have now twice tried to book a test drive and twice I have received a call on the morning cancelling the test drive which they claim their on line system should not have allowed Very poor service

Title: Lovely car shame about the people
Content: I'll start with a disclaimer my last 3 cars were Porsches and Range Rovers so I know good service when I see it I haven't seen it yet at Tesla The cars are wonderful but the 'service' is appalling Trying to buy one online was like pushing water uphill trying to deal with them afterwards has been a nightmare If you buy online make sure that absolutely ALL information is complete and accurate because they won't make the tiniest change afterwards For me this meant missing out on the free client referral mile

Title: First and last Tesla

Title: Quite Simple Don t Buy One
Content: To anyone thinking of buying a Tesla in the UK phone their customer support team 01628 450660 on 3 separate occasions if you get a response in less than an hour or at all then you ve had exceptionally good service If you do decide to order a car then when you collect your new expensive toy there will be many things wrong with it things then go downhill from here The after care and service offered is truly the worst I have ever experienced I mean really bad and when they do finally after many months of wai

Title: Don't even know where to start
Content: Don't even know where to start The delivery of our Model X today was unacceptable considering we have waited 1 year for it after months of continuous delays in our order by Tesla Scratched windshield and side exterior Soiled interior absolutely filthy for a new car No contactless delivery as stated Delivery man did not take any infection control steps such as masks gloves He wore filthy clothes and gloves Delivery man drove our car without our permission onto our driveway and forced the keys onto us and l

Title: The cars are great but should not be
Content: The cars are great but should not be sold in the UK as the company's post sales service is truly appalling My model X completely shut down due to a faulty computer part Customer service initially estimated the part would arrive from the US within 1 month only to then send me a casual email saying that I'd have to wait over 2 months I cannot think of any other car company with such an unacceptable level of service

Title: I recently got referred to the Bristol
Content: I recently got referred to the Bristol Tesla outlet after requesting a demo ride in the performance model I live 60 miles away and work They rang me within 30 minutes and offered me a test drive that afternoon I told her it wasn't possible as I had commitments I asked for Tuesday or Thursday the following week Nothing available she told me but we can do this afternoon or tomorrow at 5pm after I told her I was committed all week Yeah sure in the Bristol rush hour at 5pm that would be fun for a test drive I

Title: This is just a page for grumbling Tesla
Content: This is just a page for grumbling Tesla owners There many 1000s who have amazing experiences me included multiple times over multiple years Not sure why they think Porsche Audi or BMW are better is the free cake coffee and short skirted receptionist really all you need to say yes this is the best 5 hour wait in your waiting room ever thank you ROFL Seriously get a tesla to help progress the planet onwards if not go back to your crappy ICE and great customer service

Title: 1 Star is too many

Title: Buyer beware
Content: I've hardly driven my 2019 model S during the pandemic But I do drive enough to have noticed I have no more data no Tesla music I call customer service multiple times and it is impossible to reach a human A few days later an email notifies me that I need to get a subscription for this additional service Part of the draw was having data in the car When I purchased the car I was not warned that my data would be subject to a monthly subscription No data no customer service

Title: As a company we have 2 Model S are

Title: Tesla service is the absolute worst

Title: Worse customer service experience

Title: If your used to luxury service
Content: If your used to luxury service do NOT get a Tesla Everything is based via text message and it s literally impossible to speak to a person Took over 2 5 weeks to get my windshield in stock on the model 3 and they didn t even wash the vehicle after service

Title: I wish you could give NO STARS
Content: I wish you could give NO STARS I'm a realtor in escrow on a property with solar panels and we can NEVER GET THROUGH TO ANYONE it's been almost 2 months since all parties have filled out the REQUIRED FORMS online and nobody reaches out I will never recommend TESLA Loosing a deal over lack of customer service is RIDICULOUS

Title: Having a puncture in a Tesla is a major
Content: Having a puncture in a Tesla is a major calamity and incredibly costly if you re far from home Despite carrying a Tesla tyre repair kit which did not work we have had to delay our return to the UK from Spain by 5 days until a tyre can be shipped to us apparently no one in Spain carries the specific tyre on our Tesla X This has been very costly Tesla has paid for a tow truck to deliver our car to the hotel whilst we await delivery of a tyre that is it Our costs are as follows a taxi to take us to the hotel

Title: Sooooo HORRIBLE

Title: Speaking to a service representative to
Content: Speaking to a service representative to drop off my vehicle was cumbersome very complicated and unfriendly There was practically no room to put my car When I received my Tesla it came back with a ding and scratch on the door I own my business and have my own parking space The car is garage kept doesn't go anywhere else They took no accountability and said prove it It took forever to receive my car Other than my auto damage there have been multiple other experiences with Tesla service that were unsatisfact

Title: We have a 2015 S and suddenly our
Content: We have a 2015 S and suddenly our screen went blank resulting in an un drive able vehicle The car was towed in to the Rocklin facility where it sat for SIX days without even once hearing from Tesla We drove out to find out only to be brushed off No calls being on hold for an hour no emails Beware owners and future owners once your car is no longer under warranty you are stuck New part and installation will be 3 200 Add to that the part is on back order and they have no idea when they will be receiving it

Title: No loaner for service repairs
Content: No loaner for service repairs 1000 Price reduction of the vehicle 15 days after purchase They refuse to extend a credit for the lowered price 8 weeks to wait for 500 overpayment at purchase Double charged for home charger

Title: Car purchase AND Solar purchase terrible customer service

Title: Terrible customer service Leasing trap

Title: Purchased a Model Y and it was

Title: I like many aspects of the Tesla Model 3

Title: My car is currently at the North
Content: My car is currently at the North Scottsdale Service center I have never met a ruder group of service people These guys don t care what is going on with your vehicle and they have no desire to make you pleased with their service It is so bad that although I ve had a Tesla since 2014 I seriously doubt my car next car will be a Tesla It s that bad Save yourself the frustration and buy something else

Title: Appalling customer service
Content: I am absolutely appalled by the severe lack of customer service I ve experienced at Tesla Toronto I ordered a Model Y vehicle in March The sales rep assured me that my deposit was 100 refundable up until delivery I wanted to make sure this was the case as this model has not been released yet and I want to test drive it before committing to it She also told me that I could make any changes to my order online I couldn t decide between two colours and she assured me that I could change it online if I wanted

Title: Bad Warranty

Title: I think one start is to many
Content: I think one start is to many If your phone you are on hold forever and after 6 min they just cut you off I have set emails which are never answered When you do get to speak to someone they are helpful but it's not always followed up with any action so you have to call again its a roundabout caused by tesla I hope the car proves to be more reliable than customer service This is by far the worst customer service I have ever received by any company

Title: Are Tesla needed a new hood because a

Content: Such a shame after being such a big fan of Tesla and I still love the car the service has gone completely out the window I have referral credit to spend and it s like getting blood out of a stone to try and spend it You ll end up busy at this rate if there s no one to buy your cars I d be very careful before buying another Tesla if the service stays like this

Title: If tesla wants to build it's cars in
Content: If tesla wants to build it's cars in Germany then let's the Germans buy it Buy British

Title: A Mixed Experience
Content: The car a Model 3 is excellent and Tesla acted with integrity during the ordering process for instance honouring price decreases they made subsequent to order but before delivery However communication was and continues to be quite poor and I was disappointed that a repair that was required 6 weeks after delivery was not completed under warranty despite the part involved a felt fibre glass undertray that crumpled when wet clearly not being fit for purpose A mixed experience

Title: One of my tires was starting to go flat
Content: One of my tires was starting to go flat on the highway I called Tesla road side assistance and was on hold for 35 minutes before I just gave up After years of driving BMW Lexus Porsche Infiniti you name it I never experienced anything like that in my life They do not give you a spare tire with the car because they claim they will come out and fix it but you need someone to answer the phone I called the Springfield NJ dealership to voice my concerns and was sent to a service voicemail I left a message gues

Title: I love my car but customer service is
Content: I love my car but customer service is the worst I ve ever experienced My key fob won t work I go to Tesla service They say I need mobile service The guy spends three hours and says it s serious and I have to do Tesla service I GO BACK TO THE SAME GUY who told me mobile service and he says he ll call me between 1 2 3 o clock and no call Oh and even if you re on warranty you get UBER they pay but really I call him and clearly they hadn t even looked yet 3 30 and he says they fixed it one nice thing so I go

Title: Absolutely terrible
Content: Absolutely terrible Looking to spend 100k plus and no by even answers the phone anywhere No responses on Online chat either Real shame Great product truly dreadful customer service

Title: It's like buying a car off Amazon
Content: Impossible to even talk to anyone Spending 60k on anything you'd like to see it first No Also quite worrying that the 1st words that come up when you call is have you broken down All the hype about electric yet haven't mastered the art of customer relationship and care

Title: Worst customer service ever don t buy from them

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: Terrible customer service You do not have the ability to call in and make an appointment or even talk with anyone about your problem They refer you to the app which does not work half the time Terrible terrible customer service

Content: No problem with ordering a Model 3 P the process was easy Car was available for delivery in only 7 weeks which I felt was more than fair I could have done with a little more proactive comms through this time but on line chat and email responses were good Collection process was fine and the car is great I love it Overall I am happy with Tesla they can always improve their customer services and comms but overall my experience has been very positive so far

Content: Iam sure Tesla is trying to sabotage themselves Customer service is non existent and good luck getting anyone to care or take charge if you have a problem with your vehicle That s the real test that a company is good it s like customer service has been placed on hold I am furious I was going to purchase the model 3 for my son as I have the S and will definitely not be doing and Iam looking at other options

Content: A month or so ago I wrote a poor review for Tesla when there was no sign of the car I ordered in May and I could not speak to anyone or get replies to emails In the end I cancelled the order then having looked at every other EV out there decided the model 3 was the best So I ordered it again thinking it would take months and by then perhaps the issues would be sorted To my surprise I now have my car It is still hard to speak to anyone but has got better if you communicate by email you do get replies This

Title: Ordered a M3 in August
Content: Ordered a M3 in August collecting it tomorrow All communications via text and email and phone have been accurate and I am delighted with the service Thank you Tesla

Title: Tesla model 3
Content: Wow what an over rated car this is I was actually going to buy a Tesla 3 and had one for full 24 hours to test After driving the car for a couple of hours I decided it's not something I would waste my money on The only thing I like about the car was its speed and that's about it The inside of the car looks like a toy car it doesnt have a car feel whatsoever ig feels like you are driving a child's toy car The technology yhsts inside the car is identical to any normal gas car apart from its electrical part

Content: I have been a strong supporter of the Tesla brand until recently It seems that they have completely lost all desire to provide Customer Service here in Scotland It is impossible to get any one on the phone to answer your questions Up to June 2019 you could get help straight away from the service team However recently when I have needed to contact the team it appears that they have just shut down and no one is taking calls I guess Tesla does not want their customer base to support them going forward I will

Title: The car of the Future
Content: Tesla is the world leaders in electric transport far ahead of all the other motor companies they genuinely care about making beautiful cars far safer than any other It is a shame that other motor manufacturers are not making the same efforts to shift us off fossil fuel petrol diesel They are an incredibly innovative company and I wish them the best in their very noble mission to accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy

Title: Order RN108626214 ordered paid 45k

Title: I really REALLY wanted to give Tesla my

Title: Service review
Content: Our car has now been in since Monday for wiper one tire and a battery key It s now Wednesday night and we have not heard from anyone

Title: trying to contact Tesla

Title: Love the Car Hate the Company 2014 2019 Timeline

Title: Do you really want the best car available with the worst possible service

Title: My experience with Tesla has been

Title: THE MYTH OF BATTERY CARS
Content: While im sure teslamake great cars Batterys are not the answer Supercapacitors are being developed which in around 5 years from now will enable an electric vehicle to travel 500 miles on an 8 minute charge batterys are expensive heavy and the constant need for charging basically useless in a car WAIT until this new technology matures and save yourself a fortune or even better fuel cells water in water out zero emissions battery cars are just a stop gap and an expensive one at that
